BiblioEntry.Title: Threshold-coloring and unit-cube contact representation of planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Threshold-coloring and unit-cube contact representation of planar graphs / Md. Jawaherul Alam ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo pragovno barvanje grafov, kjer celoštevilske barve točk grafa ▫$G$▫ predstavljajo njegove vpete podgrafe. Če sta sosednji točki grafa ▫$G$▫ obarvani z bližnjima barvama, potem takšno povezavo v vpetem podgrafu obdržimo, če sta njuni barvi daleč vsaksebi, potem povezavo odstranimo. Vsi ravninski grafi ne dopuščajo pragovnega barvanja, nekateri podrazredi, denimo drevesa, nekatere ravninske mreže in ravninski grafi brez kratkih ciklov pa dopuščajo pragovno barvanje. Z uporabo rezultatov pragovnega barvanja lahko za nekatere od omenjenih podrazredov ravninskih grafov poiščemo kontaktne reprezentacije z enotskimi kockami. Različne verzije pragovnega barvanja grafov so v tesni zvezi z nekaterimi drugimi problemi barvanja in tudi drugimi konstrukti v teoriji grafov. Z njihovo pomočjo uspemo pokazati NP-polnost dveh variant iskanja pragovnega barvanja in opišemp polinomski algoritem za tretjo varianto.

In this paper we study threshold-coloring of graphs, where the vertex colors represented by integers are used to describe any spanning subgraph of the given graph as follows. A pair of vertices with a small difference in their colors implies that the edge between them is present, while a pair of vertices with a big color difference implies that the edge is absent. Not all planar graphs are threshold-colorable, but several subclasses, such as trees, some planar grids, and planar graphs with no short cycles can always be threshold-colored. Using these results we obtain unit-cube contact representation of several subclasses of planar graphs. Variants of the threshold-coloring problem are related to well-known graph coloring and other graph-theoretic problems. Using these relations we show the NP-completeness for two of these variants, and describe a polynomial-time algorithm for another.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: barvanje grafov /pragovno barvanje grafov /ravninski grafi /kontaktna predstavitev
graph coloring /threshold coloring /planar graphs /unit-cube contact representation /planar grids

BiblioEntry.Title: Odd complete minors in even embeddings on surfaces
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Odd complete minors in even embeddings on surfaces / Gašper Fijavž, Atsuhiro Nakamoto
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo problem lihih ▫$K_m$▫-minorjev v sodih vložitvah grafov v ploskve. V prvem delu predstavimo splošen rezultat o ▫$K_m$▫-minorju v sodi vložitvi. Pri izbranem naravnem številu ▫$m$▫ pokažemo, da z vsako ploskev ▫$F^2$▫ zadosti velikega roda obstaja konstanta ▫$N=N(F^2)$▫ pri kateri vsaka soda vložitev v ▫$F^2$▫ s celično širino vsaj ▫$N$▫ vsebuje lihi ▫$K_m$▫-minor. V preostanku pa pokažemo, da vsaka soda vložitev v poljubno orientabilno ploskev s celično širino vsaj 19 vsebuje lihi ▫$K_5$▫-minor.

In this paper, we study the odd ▫$K_m$▫-minor problem in even embeddings on surfaces. We first establish a general theory for even embeddings with odd ▫$K_m$▫-minors. Given an integer ▫$m$▫ we show that for every surface ▫$F^2$▫ of sufficiently high genus there exists a constant ▫$N=N(F^2)$▫ so that every non-bipartite even embedding on ▫$F^2$▫ with representativity at least ▫$N$▫ contains an odd ▫$K_m$▫ as a minor. In the second part we prove that every 19-representative non-bipartite even embedding in an arbitrary orientable surface of genus ▫$\ge 1$▫ has an odd ▫$K_5$▫-minor.

BiblioSet.Title: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Naj bo ▫$G$▫ graf vložen s celično širino vsaj 19 v poljubno nesferično orientabilno ploskev. V tem primeru ▫$G$▫ vsebuje graf ▫$K_7$▫ kot minor.
Let ▫$G$▫ be a graph embedded in a nonspherical orientable surface with face-width ▫$\ge 19$▫. We prove that ▫$G$▫ contains a minor isomorphic to ▫$K_7$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Distinguishing colorings of 3-connected planar graphs with five colors
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Distinguishing colorings of 3-connected planar graphs with five colors / Gašper Fijavž, Seiya Negami, Terukazu Sano
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pravilno barvanje grafa ▫$G$▫ s ▫$k$▫ barvami je razlikovalno, če je identiteta edini avtomorfizem grafa ▫$G$▫, ki barvanje ohranja. V članku pokažemo, da vsak 3-povezan ravninski graf, z izjemo grafov ▫$K_{2,2,2}$▫ in▫ $C_6 + \overline{K}_2$▫, dopušča razlikovalno 5-barvanje, pri katerem je največ ena točka obarvana z barvo številka 5. Po drugi strani poiščemo družino 3-povezanih ravninskih grafov, ki so razlikovalno 4-obarvljivi, toda vsako takšno barvanje vsako izmed barv uporabi na vsaj dveh točkah.

A (proper) coloring of ▫$G$▫ with ▫$k$▫ colors is called a distinguishing ▫$k$▫-coloring of ▫$G$▫ if there is no color-preserving automorphism of ▫$G$▫ other than the identity map. We prove that every 3-connected planar graph, with the exception of ▫$K_{2,2,2}$▫ and▫ $C_6 + \overline{K}_2$▫, admits a distinguishing 5-coloring which uses color 5 only for one vertex. By contrast, we present examples of 3-connected planar graphs that have distinguishing 4-colorings but not distinguishing 4-coloring with one color used only once.

BiblioEntry.Title: Strong traces model of self-assembly polypeptide structures
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Strong traces model of self-assembly polypeptide structures / Gašper Fijavž, Tomaž Pisanski, Jernej Rus

BiblioSet.Title: MATCH Communications in Mathematical and in Computer Chemistry
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: MATCH Communications in Mathematical and in Computer Chemistry

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku [Design of a single-chain polypeptide tetrahedron assembled from coiled-coil segments, Nature Chemical Biology 9 (2013) 362--366] je predstavljena nova strategija samo-sestavljanja polipeptidnih nanostruktur. Prvi matematični model (polipeptidno nanostrukturo lahko predstavimo kot 1-skelet poliedra) v [Stable traces as a model for self-assembly of polypeptide nanoscale polyhedrons, MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 70 (2013) 317-330] uvaja stabilne obhode kot ustrezen matematični opis, ki pa ima pomanjkljivosti v primeru modeliranja grafov s točkami zelo majhne (▫$\le 2$▫) ali velike (▫$\ge 6$▫) stopnje. Z uvedbo krepkih obhodov uspemo rešiti obe omenjeni težavi. S študijem zveze med krepkimi obhodi in vložitvami grafov v ploskve pokažemo, da vsak povezan graf vsebuje krepek obhod. Nadalje natančno karakteriziramo grafe, ki dopuščajo paralelen (oz. antiparalelen) krepki obhod.

A novel self-assembly strategy for polypeptide nanostructure design was presented in [Design of a single-chain polypeptide tetrahedron assembled from coiled-coil segments, Nature Chemical Biology 9 (2013) 362--366]. The first mathematical model (polypeptide nanostructure can naturally be presented as a skeleton graph of a polyhedron) from [Stable traces as a model for self-assembly of polypeptide nanoscale polyhedrons, MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 70 (2013) 317-330] introduced stable traces as the appropriate mathematical description, yet we find them deficient in modeling graphs with either very small (▫$\le 2$▫) or large (▫$\ge 6$▫) degree vertices. We introduce strong traces which remedy both of the above mentioned drawbacks. We show that every connected graph admits a strong trace by studying a connection between strong traces and graph embeddings. Further we also characterize graphs which admit parallel (resp. antiparallel) strong traces.

BiblioEntry.Title: 3-Connected planar graphs are 5-distinguishing colorable with two exceptions
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: 3-Connected planar graphs are 5-distinguishing colorable with two exceptions / Gašper Fijavž, Seiya Negami, Sano Terukazu
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Graf ▫$G$▫ je razlikovalno ▫$d$▫-obarvljiv, če dopušča takšno barvanje točk z ▫$d$▫ barvami, da, razen identitete, ne obstaja avtomorfizem grafa ▫$G$▫, ki bi ohranjal barve točk. V članku pokažemo, da je vsak 3-povezan ravninski graf razen ▫$K_{2,2,2}$ in $C_6 + \overline{K}_2$▫ razlikovalno 5-obarvljiv. Pokažemo tudi, da je vsak dvodelen 3-povezan ravninski graf razlikovalno 3-obarvljiv, razen grafov ▫$Q_3$▫ in ▫$R(Q_3)$▫.

A graph ▫$G$▫ is said to be▫ $d$▫-distinguishing colorable if there is a ▫$d$▫-coloring of ▫$G$▫ such that no automorphism of ▫$G$▫ except the identity map preserves colors. We prove that every 3-connected planar graph is 5-distinguishing colorable except ▫$K_{2,2,2}$▫ and ▫$C_6 + \overline{K}_2$▫ and that every 3-connected bipartite planar graph is 3-distinguishing colorable except ▫$Q_3$▫ and ▫$R(Q_3)$▫.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: graph theory /planar graphs /distinguishing coloring /distinguishing chromatic number /3-connected graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: On the maximum number of cliques in a graph embedded in a surface
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: On the maximum number of cliques in a graph embedded in a surface / Vida Dujmović ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Obravnavamo naslednji problem: za izbrano naravno število ▫$n$▫ in ploskev ▫$\Sigma$▫ bi radi poiskali maksimalno število klik v grafu ▫$G$▫ z ▫$n$▫ točkami, ki je vložljiv v plokev ▫$\Sigma$▫. Pri tem uspemo karakterizirati ekstremalne grafe in pokažemo, da leži maksimalno število klik med ▫$8(n-\omega) + 2^{\omega}$▫ in ▫$8n + \frac{5}{2} 2^{\omega} + o(2^{\omega})$▫, kjer z ▫$\omega$▫ označimo maksimalno velikost polnega grafa vložljivega v ▫$\Sigma$▫. Za ploskve majhnega Eulerjevega roda ▫$\mathbb{S}_0$▫, ▫$\mathbb{S}_1$▫, ▫$\mathbb{S}_2$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_1$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_2$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_3$▫ and ▫$\mathbb{N}_4$▫ poiščemo tudi natančen odgovor.

This paper studies the following question: Given a surface ▫$\Sigma$▫ and an integer ▫$n$▫, what is the maximum number of cliques in an ▫$n$▫-vertex graph embeddable in ▫$\Sigma$▫? We characterise the extremal graphs for this question,and prove that the answer is between ▫$8(n-\omega) + 2^{\omega}$▫ and ▫$8n + \frac{5}{2} 2^{\omega} + o(2^{\omega})$▫, where ▫$\omega$▫ is the maximum integer such that the complete graph ▫$K_\omega$▫ embeds in ▫$\Sigma$▫. For the surfaces ▫$\mathbb{S}_0$▫, ▫$\mathbb{S}_1$▫, ▫$\mathbb{S}_2$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_1$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_2$▫, ▫$\mathbb{N}_3$▫ and ▫$\mathbb{N}_4$▫ we establish an exact answer.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: mathematics /graph theory /number of cliques /graph embeddings /irreducible triangulations

BiblioEntry.Title: Graph minors and minimum degree
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Graph minors and minimum degree [Elektronski vir] / Gašper Fijavž, David R. Wood

BiblioSet.Title: The Electronic journal of combinatorics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The Electronic journal of combinatorics [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Z ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ označimo razred grafov, za katere velja, da ima vsak njihov minor točko stopnje največ ▫$k$▫. Razred ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ je zaprt za grafovske minorje. Izrek o grafovskih minorjih Robertson-Seymourja trdi, da lahko razred ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ karakteriziramo s končno družino prepovedanih minorjev, ki jo označimo z ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫. V članku študiramo družine ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫. Naši štirje glavni rezultati so: (1) Vsak ▫$(k+1)$▫-regularen graf z največ ▫$\frac{4}{3}(k+2)$▫ točkami pripada ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫, in meja o številu točk je najboljša možna. (2) Natančno opišemo grafe iz ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_{k+1}$▫, ki jih lahko dobimo iz grafov v ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ z dodajanjem ene same točke. (3) Pri ▫$k\leq 3$▫ so vsi grafi družine ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ tudi ▫$(k+1)$▫-povezani, za velike ▫$k$▫ pa lahko konstruiramo grafe ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ s povezanostjo 1. Še več, konstruiramo lahko grafe v ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ s poljubno bločno srukturo. (4) Karakteriziramo polne multipartitne grafe tako iz ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫, kot tudi iz analognih družin prepovedanih minorjev v primeru parametrov povezanosti, drevesne širine in linearne drevesne širine.

Let ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ be the class of graphs for which every minor has minimum degree at most ▫$k$▫. Then ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ is closed under taking minors. By the Robertson-Seymour graph minor theorem, ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ is characterised by a finite family of minor-minimal forbidden graphs, which we denote by ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫. This paper discusses ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ and related topics. We obtain four main results: (1) We prove that every ▫$(k+1)$▫-regular graph with less than ▫$\frac{4}{3}(k+2)$▫ vertices is in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫, and this bound is best possible. (2) We characterise the graphs in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_{k+1}$▫ that can be obtained from a graph in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ by adding one new vertex. (3) For ▫$k\leq 3$▫ every graph in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ is ▫$(k+1)$▫-connected, but for large ▫$k$▫, we exhibit graphs in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫ with connectivity ▫$1$▫. In fact, we construct graphs in ▫$\mathcal{D}_k$▫ with arbitrary block structure. (4) We characterise the complete multipartite graphs in ▫$\widehat{\mathcal{D}}_k$▫, and prove analogous characterisations with minimum degree replaced by connectivity, treewidth, or pathwidth.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: mathematics /graph theory /graph minor /excluded minor /forbidden minor /minimum degree

BiblioEntry.Title: Rigidity and separation indices of graphs in surfaces
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Rigidity and separation indices of graphs in surfaces / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: 20th Workshop on Topological Graph Theory (TGT20), Yokohama National University, November 20-28, 2008

BiblioSet.Title: Proceeding of TGT20
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Proceeding of TGT20 / Katsuhiro Ota, Atsuhiro Nakamoto (eds.)

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Izberimo ploskev ▫$\Sigma$▫. V članku pokažemo, da je rigidnostni indeks grafov, ki so poliedrsko vložljivi v ploskev ▫$\Sigma$▫ kot tudi 5-povezanih grafov vložljivih v ▫$\Sigma$▫, omejen s konstanto, odvisno samo od ploskve ▫$\Sigma$▫. Če je Eulerjeva karakteristika ploskve ▫$\Sigma$▫ negativna, je separacijski indeks grafov, ki so poliedrsko vložljivi v ▫$\Sigma$▫, tudi omejen s konstanto, odvisno samo od ploskve ▫$\Sigma$▫. Posledično omejimo navzgor tudi razlikovalno število ▫$\Sigma$▫-poliederskih in 5-povezanih grafov vložljivih v ▫$\Sigma$▫.

Let ▫$\Sigma▫$ be a surface. We prove that rigidity indices of graphs which admit a polyhedral embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ and 5-connected graphs admitting an embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ are bounded by a constant depending on ▫$\Sigma$▫. Moreover if the Euler characteristic of ▫$\Sigma$▫ is negative, then the separation index of graphs admitting a polyhedral embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ is also bounded. As a side result we show that distinguishing number of both ▫$\Sigma$▫-polyhedral and 5-connected graphs which admit and embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ is also bounded.

mathematics /graph theory /polyhedral embedding /graph automorphism /group action /genus of graph /separation index /rigidity index /5-connected graph

BiblioEntry.Title: Contractible subgraphs, Thomassen's conjecture and the dominating cycle conjecture for snarks
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Contractible subgraphs, Thomassen's conjecture and the dominating cycle conjecture for snarks / Hajo Broersma ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da so domneve Matthewsa in Sumnerja (vsak 4-povezan graf ▫$K_1$▫, 3-prost graf je Hamiltonski), Thomassena (vsak 4-povezan povezavni graf je Hamiltonski) in Fleischnerja (vsak ciklično po povezavah 4-povezan kubičen graf je po povezavah 3-obarvljiv ali pa vsebuje dominantni cikel), za katere je znano, da so enakovredne, enakovredne trditvi, da ima vsak snark (ciklično po povezavah 4-povezan kubičen graf dolžine vsaj 5, ki ni po povezavah 3-obarvljiv) dominantni cikel.

We show that the conjectures by Matthews and Sumner (every 4-connected claw-free graph is Hamiltonian), by Thomassen (every 4-connected line graph is Hamiltonian) and by Fleischner (every cyclically 4-edge-connected cubic graph has either a 3-edge-coloring or a dominating cycle), which are known to be equivalent, are equivalent to the statement that every snark (i.e. a cyclically 4-edge-connected cubic graph of girth at least five that is not 3-edge-colorable) has a dominating cycle. We use a refinement of the contractibility technique which was introduced by Ryjácek and Schelp in 2003 as a common generalization and strengthening of the reduction techniques by Catlin and Veldman and of the closure concept introduced by Ryjácek in 1997.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /teorija grafov /dominantni cikel /skrčljiv graf /kubični graf /snark /povezavni graf /hamiltonski graf
mathematics /graf theory /dominating cycle /contractible graph /cubic graph /snark /line graph /Hamiltonian graph

BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The minor crossing number of graphs with an excluded minor [Elektronski vir] / Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž, David R. Wood

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The Electronic journal of combinatorics [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Minorsko prekrižno število grafa ▫$G$▫ je najmanjše prekrižno število kakega grafa, ki vsebuje ▫$G$▫ kot minor. V prispevku pokažemo, da za vsak graf ▫$H$▫ obstaja konstanta ▫$c>0$▫, tako da ima vsak graf brez ▫$H$▫-minorja minorsko prekrižno število enako največ ▫$c|V(G)|$▫.

The minor crossing number of a graph ▫$G$▫ is the minimum crossing number of a graph that contains ▫$G$▫ as a minor. It is proved that for every graph ▫$H$▫ there is a constant ▫$c$▫, such that every graph ▫$G$▫ with no ▫$H$▫-minor has minor crossing number at most ▫$c|V(G)|$▫.

BiblioSet.TitleISBD: The International Conference on Topological and Geometric Graph Theory, Paris, 19-23 May 2008 [Elektronski vir] / Ed. by Patrice Ossona de Mendez ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: A graph ▫$G$▫ is a minor minimal minimum degree graph (MMMD) if ▫$d(H)<d(G)$▫ for every proper minor ▫$H$▫ of ▫$G$▫. We (i) determine all complete multipartite MMMD graphs and show that (ii) every small ▫$k$▫-regular graph is a MMMD graph. Intuitively it seems that MMMD graphs are highly connected. Countering that (iii) we show that MMMD graphs may have a rich block-structure.

BiblioEntry.Title: Geometric realization of Möbius triangulations
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Geometric realization of Möbius triangulations / María Jose Chávez ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Möbiusova triangulacija je triangulacija Möbiusovega traku. Geometrijska realizacija vloženega grafa ▫$M$▫ na ploskvi ▫$\Sigma$▫ je takšna vložitev ploskve ▫$\Sigma$▫ v 3-razsežen Evklidski prostor, da je slika vsakega lica ▫$M$▫ ravninski mnogokotnik. V članku pokažemo, da ima vsaka 5-povezana Möbiusova triangulacija geometrijsko realizacijo. Glavno orodje dokaza je izrek, da za vsako 5-povezano triangulacijo projektivne ravnine ▫$G$▫ in vsakonjeno lice ▫$f$▫ velja, da ima Möbiusova triangulacija ▫$G-f$▫, ki jo dobimo tako, da ▫$G$▫ odstranimo notranjost lica ▫$f$▫, geometrijsko realizacijo.

A Möbius triangulation is a triangulation on the Möbius band. A geometric realization of a map ▫$M$▫ on a surface ▫$\Sigma$▫ is an embedding of ▫$\Sigma$▫ into a Euclidean 3-space ▫$\mathbb{R}^3$▫ such that each face of ▫$M$▫ is a flat polygon. In this paper, we shall prove that every 5-connected triangulation on the Möbius band has a geometric realization. In order to prove it, we prove that if ▫$G$▫ is a 5-connected triangulation on the projective plane, then for any face ▫$f$▫ of ▫$G$▫, the Möbius triangulation ▫$G-f$▫ obtained from ▫$G$▫ by removing the interior of ▫$f$▫ has a geometric realization.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /teorija grafov /triangulacija /Möbiusov trak /projektivna ravnina /vložitev grafa /geometrijska realizacija
mathematics /graph theory /triangulation /Möbius band /projective plane /geometric realization /graph embedding

BiblioEntry.Title: Hadwiger's conjecture for circular colorings of edge-weighted graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Hadwiger's conjecture for circular colorings of edge-weighted graphs / Gašper Fijavž
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Let ▫$G^w=(V,E,w)$▫ be a weighted graph, where ▫$G=(V,E)$▫ is its underlying graph and ▫$w: E \to [1,\infty)$▫ is the edge weight function. A (circular) ▫$p$▫-coloring of ▫$G^w$▫ is a mapping ▫$c$▫ of its vertices into a circle of perimeter ▫$p$▫ so that every edge ▫$e=uv$▫ satisfies dist▫$(c(u),c(v)) \ge w(uv)$▫. The smallest ▫$p$▫ allowing a ▫$p$▫-coloring of ▫$G^w$▫ is its circular chromatic number, ▫$\chi_c(G^w)$▫. A ▫$p$▫-basic graph is a weighted complete graph, whose edge weights satisfy triangular inequalities, and whose optimal traveling salesman tour has length ▫$p$▫. Weighted Hadwiger's conjecture (WHC) at ▫$p \ge 1$▫ states that if ▫$p$▫ is the largest real number so that ▫$G^w$▫ contains some ▫$p$▫-basic graph as a weighted minor, then ▫$\chi_c(G^w) \le p$▫. We prove that WHC is true for ▫$p<4$▫ and false for ▫$p \ge 4▫$, and also that WHC is true for series-parallel graphs.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /teorija grafov /uteženi grafi /uteženi minorji /krožno barvanje /Hadwigerjava domneva
mathematics /graph theory /edge-weighted graph /edge-weighted minor /circular coloring /Hadwiger's conjecture

BiblioEntry.Title: Contractions of 6-connected toroidal graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Contractions of 6-connected toroidal graphs / Gašper Fijavž

BiblioSet.Title: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Journal of combinatorial theory. Series B

BiblioEntry.Abstract: S ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫ označimo razred 6-povezanih (ekvivalentno 6-regularnih) torusnih grafov. Naj bo ▫$G \in {\mathcal T}_6$▫, ki ni minor-minimalen element družine ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫. Z ▫$G' \in {\mathcal T}_6$▫ označimo pravi minor grafa ▫$G$▫ z največjim številom točk. Pokažemo, da je ▫$|V(G)|-|V(G')| = fw(G)$▫, kjer s ▫$fw(G)$▫ označimo celično širino torusne vložitve grafa ▫$G$▫. Posledično lahko poiščemo vse minor-minimalne grafe v razredu ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫. Le-ti so ▫$K_7$▫, ▫$K_8-4K_2$▫, ▫$K_9-C_9$▫ in ▫$K_9-3K_3$▫.

Let ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫ denote the class of all 6-connected (equivalently 6-regular) toroidal graphs and let ▫$G \in {\mathcal T}_6$▫ which is not minor-minimal in ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫. Let ▫$G' \in {\mathcal T}_6$▫ be a proper minor of ▫$G$▫ with maximum number of vertices. We show that ▫$|V(G)|-|V(G')| = fw(G)$▫, where ▫$fw(G)$▫ denotes the face-width of the toroidal embedding of ▫$G$▫. Consequently, we show that the only minor-minimal graphs in ▫${\mathcal T}_6$▫ are ▫$K_7$▫, ▫$K_8-4K_2$▫, ▫$K_9-C_9$▫, and ▫$K_9-3K_3$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: Coloring weighted series-parallel graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Coloring weighted series-parallel graphs / Gašper Fijavž

BiblioSet.Title: Informatica
BiblioSet.Subtitle: an international journal of computing and informatics

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Povezave vzporedno-zaporednega grafa ▫$G$▫ utežimo s pozitivnimi celoštevilskimi utežmi. ▫$p$▫-barvanje grafa ▫$G$▫ je taka preslikava točk grafa v ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ (kolobar ostankov po modulu ▫$p$▫), da sta barvi sosednjih točk ▫$u$▫ in ▫$v$▫ v ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ oddaljeni vsaj za utež povezave ▫$uv$▫. V članku predstavimo kvadratičen algoritem za ▫$p$▫-barvanje grafa ▫$G$▫, kjer je ▫$p$▫ ali maksimalna vsota treh uteži povezav s skupnega cikla ali pa dvakratna utež najtežje povezave.

Let ▫$G$▫ be a series-parallel graph with integer edge weights. A ▫$p$▫-coloring of ▫$G$▫ is a mapping of vertices of ▫$G$▫ into ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ (ring of integers modulo ▫$p$▫) so that the distance between colors of adjacent vertices of ▫$u$▫ and ▫$v$▫ is at least the weight of the edge ▫$uv$▫. We describe a quadratic time ▫$p$▫-coloring algorithm where ▫$p$▫ is either twice the maximum edge weight or the largest possible sum of three weights of edges lying on a common cycle.

BiblioEntry.Title: The minor crossing number
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The minor crossing number / Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Minorsko prekrižno število grafa ▫$G$▫ definiramo kot najmanjše prekrižno število med vsemi grafi, ki vsebujejo ▫$G$▫ kot minor. V članku so predstavljene osnovne lastnosti te nove grafovske invariante. Raziskana je topološka struktura grafov z omejenim minorskim prekrižnim številom. Določena je krepka različica spodnje meje, ki sledi iz roda grafa. Poleg tega je razširjena neenakost Morena in Salazarja med prekrižnim številom grafa in njegovih minorjev.

The minor crossing number of a graph ▫$G$▫ is defined as the minimum crossing number of all graphs that contain ▫$G$▫ as a minor. Basic properties of this new invariant are presented. Topological structure of graphs with bounded minor crossing number is determined and a new strong version of a lower bound based on the genus is derived. An inequality of Moreno and Salazar between crossing numbers of a graph and its minors is generalized.

BiblioEntry.Title: Rigidity and separation indices of Paley graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Rigidity and separation indices of Paley graphs / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da je lahko razmerje med separacijskim in rigidnostnim številom grafa poljubno veliko. Tej lastnosti ustrezajo na primer Paleyjevi grafi.
It is shown that the ratio between separation and rigidity indices of graphs may be arbitrarily large. Paley graphs are such examples.

BiblioEntry.Title: Minor-minimal 6-regular graphs in the Klein bottle
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Minor-minimal 6-regular graphs in the Klein bottle / Gašper Fijavž
BiblioEntry.Abstract: S ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫ označimo razred 6-regularnih grafov vložljivih v Kleinovo steklenico. S pomočjo karakterizacije grafov v ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫ poiščemo vse minor-minimalne grafe razreda ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫. Posledično pokažemo, (i) da vsak 6-regularen graf v Kleinovi steklenici vsebuje 6-povezan minor in (ii) da ne obstaja 6-regularen graf, ki bi bil vložljiv tako v torus kot v Kleinovo steklenico.

Let ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫ denote the class of all 6-regular graphs which admit an embedding into the Klein bottle. Using the characterization of graphs in ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫ we find minor minimal graphs in ▫${\mathcal K}_6$▫. As a corollary we show that (i) every 6-regular Klein bottlal graph contains a 6-connected minor, and (ii) no 6-regular graph admits an embedding in both the torus and the Klein bottle.

mathematics /graph theory /Klein bottlal graphs /6-regular graphs /minor-minimal graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: The circular chromatic number of a digraph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The circular chromatic number of a digraph / D. Bokal ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Definirano je krožno kromatično število ▫$\chi_c$▫, pokazani so razni osnovni rezultati. Ti potrdijo, da je teorija barvanj digrafov podobna teoriji barvanj usmerjenih grafov, pri čemer neodvisne množice nadomestimo z acikličnimi. Ker imajo usmerjeni ▫$k$▫-cikli krožno kromatično število enako ▫$k/(k-1)$▫ za ▫$k \ge 2$▫, so mogoče vrednosti ▫$\chi_c$▫ tudi med 1 in 2. Pokažemo, da ▫$\chi_c$▫ lahko zavzame vse racionalne vrednosti, večje od 1. Poleg tega obstajajo digrafi s poljubno veliko dolžino najkrajšega usmerjenega cikla in hkrati s poljubno visokim krožnim kromatičnim številom. Problem odločanja, ali je za dani graf ▫$\chi_c \ge 2$▫ je NP-poln.

We introduce the circular chromatic number ▫$\chi_c$▫ of a digraph and establish various basic results. They show that the coloring theory for digraphs is similar to the coloring theory for undirected graphs when independend sets of vertices are replaced by acyclic sets. Since the directed ▫$k$▫-cycle has circular chromatic number ▫$k/(k-1)$▫, for ▫$k \ge 2$▫, values of ▫$\chi_c$▫ between 1 and 2 are possible. We show that in fact, ▫$\chi_c$▫ takes on all rational values greather then 1. Furthermore, there exist digraphs of arbitrarily large digirth and circular chromatic number. It is NP-complete to decide if a given digraph has ▫$\chi_c$▫ at most 2.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /teorija grafov /krožno kromatično število /kromatično število /usmerjeni grafi /aciklični homomorfizem /NP-polnost
mathematics /graph theory /circular chromatic number /chromatic number /digraph /acyclic homomorphism /NP-completeness /digirth

BiblioEntry.Title: K [sub] 6 -minors in projective planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: K [sub] 6 -minors in projective planar graphs / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Dokazano je, da vsak 5-povezan graf, ki je vložen v projektivno ravnino s celično širino vsaj 3, vsebuje polni graf ▫$K_6$▫ kot minor.
It is shown that every 5-connected graph embedded in the projective plane with face-width at least 3 contains the complete graph on 6 vertices as a minor.

BiblioEntry.Title: Planar graphs without cycles of specific lengths
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Planar graphs without cycles of specific lengths / G. Fijavž ... [et al.]
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Ni se težko prepričati, da je vsak ravninski graf brez 3-ciklov 3-degeneriran. Znano je tudi, da je vsak ravninski graf brez 5-ciklov 3-degeneriran. V članku je dokazano, da so 3-degenerirani tudi ravninski grafi brez 6-ciklov.

It is easy to see that planar graphs without 3-cycles are 3-degenerate. Recently, it was proved that planar graphs without 5-cycles are also 3-degenerate. In this paper it is shown, more surprisingly, that the same holds for planar graphs without 6-cycles.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: V članku obravnavamo pragovno barvanje grafov, kjer celoštevilske barve točk grafa ▫$G$▫ predstavljajo njegove vpete podgrafe. Če sta sosednji točki grafa ▫$G$▫ obarvani z bližnjima barvama, potem takšno povezavo v vpetem podgrafu obdržimo, če sta njuni barvi daleč vsaksebi, potem povezavo odstranimo. Vsi ravninski grafi ne dopuščajo pragovnega barvanja, nekateri podrazredi, denimo drevesa, nekatere ravninske mreže in ravninski grafi brez kratkih ciklov pa dopuščajo pragovno barvanje. Z uporabo rezultatov pragovnega barvanja lahko za nekatere od omenjenih podrazredov ravninskih grafov poiščemo kontaktne reprezentacije z enotskimi kockami. Različne verzije pragovnega barvanja grafov so v tesni zvezi z nekaterimi drugimi problemi barvanja in tudi drugimi konstrukti v teoriji grafov. Z njihovo pomočjo uspemo pokazati NP-polnost dveh variant iskanja pragovnega barvanja in opišemp polinomski algoritem za tretjo varianto.

We study threshold coloring of graphs where the vertex colors, represented by integers, describe any spanning subgraph of the given graph as follows. Pairs of vertices with near colors imply the edge between them is present and pairs of vertices with far colors imply the edge is absent. Not all planar graphs are threshold-colorable, but several subclasses, such as trees, some planar grids, and planar graphs with no short cycles can always be threshold-colored. Using these results we obtain unit-cube contact representation of several subclasses of planar graphs. We show the NP-completeness for two variants of the threshold coloring problem and describe a polynomial-time algorithm for another.

graph theory /threshold coloring /contact representation /planar grids /planar graphs

BiblioEntry.Title: A modular hybrid approach to employee timetabling
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: A modular hybrid approach to employee timetabling / Drago Bokal ... [et al.]

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: 7th International Conference on the Practice and Theory of Automated Timetabling - PATAT 2008, Université de Montréal, August 18 - 22, 2008

BiblioSet.Title: Complete program
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Complete program / 7th International Conference on the Practice and Theory of Automated Timetabling - PATAT 2008

BiblioEntry.Abstract: We consider a classical employee timetabling problem: a set of employees with various skill levels, qualifications, workload and availability distributions has to be assigned to a set of shifts, each requiring a prescribed number of qualified employees and spanning a given time period. The novelty of our approach is a hybrid combination of the methods proposed in bibliography, such that we leverage the advantages of known methods while minimizing their disadvantages. Thus, we first apply the generalized local hill-climbing with randomized neighborhoods to quickly reach the vicinity of local optima, and then use the tabu search to explore more of the search space around those solutions. Our experiments show that the resulting hybrid technique performs better than the comparable approaches presented in bibliography due to the hybrid nature of the technique. In addition, we propose a modular design that utilizes dependency injection to compose the the search algorithm. Together with careful modeling, this approach allows for constant-time evaluation of each possible step in the neighborhood and for an easy evaluation of different hybrid combinations that can be combined and parameterized at runtime.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: operations research /employee timetabling /generalized local hill-climbing /tabu search /hybrid local optimization

BiblioEntry.Title: Contractible subgraphs, Thomassen's conjecture and the dominating cycle conjecture for snarks
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Contractible subgraphs, Thomassen's conjecture and the dominating cycle conjecture for snarks / Hajo Broersma ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics
BiblioSet.TitleISBD: Electronic notes in discrete mathematics [Elektronski vir]

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da so domneve Matthewsa in Sumnerja (vsak 4-povezan graf ▫$K_1$▫, 3-prost graf je Hamiltonski), Thomassena (vsak 4-povezan povezavni graf je Hamiltonski) in Fleischnerja (vsak ciklično po povezavah 4-povezan kubičen graf je po povezavah 3-obarvljiv ali pa vsebuje dominantni cikel), za katere je znano, da so enakovredne, enakovredne trditvi, da ima vsak snark (ciklično po povezavah 4-povezan kubičen graf dolžine vsaj 5, ki ni po povezavah 3-obarvljiv) dominantni cikel.

We show that the conjectures by Matthews and Sumner (every 4-connected claw-free graph is hamiltonian), by Thomassen (every 4-connected line graph is hamiltonian) and by Fleischner (every cyclically 4-edge-connected cubic graph has either a 3-edge-coloring or a dominating cycle), which are known to be equivalent, are equivalent with the statement that every snark (i.e. a cyclically 4-edge-connected cubic graph of girth at least five that is not 3-edge-colorable) has a dominating cycle. We use a refinement of the contractibility technique which was introduced by Ryjácek and Schelp in 2003 as a common generalization and strengthening of the reduction techniques by Catlin and Veldman and of the closure concept introduced by Ryjácek in 1997.

BiblioEntry.Title: Minor-monotone crossing number
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Minor-monotone crossing number / Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

AuthorGroup.CorpAuthor: European Conference on Combinatorics, Graph Theory and Applications, EuroComb 2005, Technische Universität, Berlin, September 5-9, 2005

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Minorsko prekrižno število grafa ▫$G$▫, ▫$\mathrm{mcr}(G)$▫, definiramo kot najmanjše prekrižno število med vsemi grafi, ki vsebujejo ▫$G$▫ kot minor. Predstavimo osnovne lastnosti te nove grafovske invariante. Za nekaj pomembnih družin grafov z upoštevanjem njihove topološke strukture podamo ocene, ki zadoščajo pogoju ▫$\mathrm{mcr}(G) \le k$▫.

The minor crossing number of a graph ▫$G$▫, ▫$\mathrm{mcr}(G)$▫, is defined as the minimum crossing number of all graphs that contain ▫$G$▫ as a minor. We present some basic properties of this new minor-monotone graph invariant. We give estimates on ▫$\mathrm{mcr}$▫ for some important graph families using the topological structure of graphs satisfying ▫$\mathrm{mcr}(G) \le k$▫.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: mathematics /graph theory /crossing number /minor-monotone graph parameter /graph minor

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Povezave vzporedno-zaporednega grafa ▫$G$▫ utežimo s pozitivnimi celoštevilskimi utežmi. ▫$p$▫-barvanje grafa ▫$G$▫ je taka preslikava točk grafa v ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ (kolobar ostankov po modulu ▫$p$▫), da sta barvi sosednjih točk ▫$u$▫ in ▫$v$▫ v ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ oddaljeni vsaj za utež povezave ▫$uv$▫. V članku predstavimo kvadratičen algoritem za ▫$p$▫-barvanje grafa ▫$G$▫, kjer je ▫$p$▫ ali maksimalna vsota treh uteži povezav s skupnega cikla ali pa dvakratna utež najtežje povezave.

Let ▫$G$▫ be a series-parallel graph with integer edge weights. A ▫$p$▫-coloring of ▫$G$▫ is a mapping of vertices of ▫$G$▫ into ▫$\ZZ_p$▫ (ring of integers modulo ▫$p$▫) so that the distance between colors of adjacent vertices of ▫$u$▫ and ▫$v$▫ is at least the weight of the edge ▫$uv$▫. We describe a quadratic time ▫$p$▫-coloring algorithm where ▫$p$▫ is either twice the maximum edge weight or the largest possible sum of three weights of edges lying on a common cycle.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da vsak 5-povezan graf, vložljiv v projektivno ravnino s celično širino vsaj 3, vsebuje ▫$K_6$▫ kot minor. Predstavimo enostaven dokaz, da vsak 5-povezan ravninski graf vsebuje ikozaeder kot minor. Z dodatkom enostavnega pogoja o celični strukturi grafa isti dokaz razširimo na 5-povezane grafe vložene v poljubno ploskev.

We show that every 5-connected graph admitting an embedding into the projective plane with face-width at least 3 contains ▫$K_6$▫ as a minor. Further we find a simple proof that every 5-connected planar graph contracts to icosahedron. We adapt the proof and find a simple face-width type condition such that every 5-connected graph embedded in an arbitrary surface satisfying the condition contracts to icosahedron.

BiblioEntry.Title: Grafovski minorji in povezanost : disertacija
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Grafovski minorji in povezanost : disertacija / Gašper Fijavž
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: disertacija

Notes.Dissertation: Univerza v Ljubljani, Fakulteta za matematiko in fiziko

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Graf ▫$G$▫ je minimalen ▫$k$▫-povezan, če je ▫$k$▫-povezan, medtem ko noben njegov pravi minor ni ▫$k$▫-povezan. Motivacijo za študij minimalnih ▫$k$▫-povezanih grafov črpamo iz teorije minor-monotonih grafovskih invariant. Znana rezultata teorije grafov določata minimalne ▫$k$▫-povezane grafe za ▫$k \le 4$▫: ▫$K_4$▫ je edini minimalni 3-povezan graf, medtem ko sta ▫$K_5$▫ in ▫$K_{2,2,2}$▫ edina minimalna 4-povezana grafa. Družine vseh minimalnih ▫$k$▫-povezanih grafov za ▫$k \ge 5$▫ še niso znane.V disertaciji obravnavamo minimalne 5-povezane in 6-povezane grafe skupaj z njihovimi vložitvami v ploskve. Analizo primerov izdelamo glede na celično širino in veliko celično širino vložitev. S pomočjo velike celične širine poiščemo zadosten pogoj, pod katerim 5-povezan graf ▫$G$▫, vložen v ploskev ▫$\Signa$▫, vsebuje ikozaeder kot minor. Pokažemo, da vsak 5 povezan graf, vložen v projektivno ravnino s celično širino vsaj 3, vsebuje ▫$K_6$▫ kot minor. Nadalje poiščemo vse minimalne 5-povezane grafe, ki so vložljivi v projektivno ravnino tj. poiščemo tako množico minimalnih 5-povezanih grafov ▫$\cal{S}$▫, da vsak 5-povezan projektivni ravninski graf ▫$G$▫ vsebuje minor iz ▫$\cal{S}$▫. Množica ▫$\cal{S}$▫, poleg ikozaedra in ▫$K_6$▫, vsebuje še dva grafa. Dokažemo tudi, da obstajajo natanko 4 minimalni 6-povezani torusni grafi. Poleg tega za vsak 6-povezan torusni graf ▫$G$▫ pokažemo, da ne vsebuje pravega 6-povezanega minorja na več kot ▫$|V(G)|-\rm{fw}(G)$▫ točkah, pri čemer s ▫$\rm{fw}(G)$▫ označimo celično širino vložitve grafa ▫$G$▫ v torus.

We say that the graph ▫$G$▫ is minimal ▫$k$▫-connected, if it is ▫$k$▫-connected and does not contain a proper ▫$k$▫-connected minor. The motivation for studing minimal ▫$k$▫-connected graphs comes from the theory of minor-monotone graph invariants. Two well known graph-theoretic rersulta determine the minimal ▫$k$▫-connected graphs for ▫$k \le 4$▫, namely: ▫$K_4$▫ is the only minimal 3-connected graph, whereas ▫$K_5$▫ and ▫$K_{2.2.2}$▫ are the only minimal 4-connected graphs. The complete collections of minimal ▫$k$▫-connected graphs for ▫$k \ge 5$▫ have not been determined yet. In the thesis we study minimal 5-connected and 6-connected graphs using their embeddings into surfaces. We do case analysis with respect to the face-width and upper face-width of the embeddings. Using upper face-width, we find a sufficient condition for an embedded graph to contain an icosahedron minor. We show that every 5-connected graph embedded in the projective-plane with face-width at least 3 contains ▫$K_6$▫ as a minor. Further we find a set ▫$\cal{S}$▫ of all minimal 5-connected projective-planar graphs. Both ▫$K_6$▫ and icosahedron belong to ▫$\cal{S}$▫, which in turn contains additional two graphs. We also show, that there exist exactly four minimal 6-connected toroidal graphs. As a side result we show, that no 6-connected toroidal graph ▫$G$▫ contains a proper 6-connected minor on more than ▫$|V(G)| - \rm{fw}(G)$▫, where ▫$\rm{fw}(G)$▫ denotes the face-width of a toroidal embedding of ▫$G$▫.

mathematics /graph theory /graph minors /connectivity /5-connectivity /6-connectivity /graph embeddings /projective-planar graphs /toroidal graphs /minor-monotone graph invariants

BiblioEntry.Title: Minor-monotone invariante grafov : magistrsko delo
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Minor-monotone invariante grafov : magistrsko delo / Gašper Fijavž
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: magistrsko delo

Notes.Dissertation: Univ. Ljubljana, FMF Matematika, Raziskovalna smer

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Yves Colin de Verdière je definiral grafovsko invarianto ▫$\mu$▫, ki povezuje spektralne in topološke lastnosti grafa. Z njo na primer karakteriziramo grafe, na vrhu vsega pa je monotona za minorje. Na tem mestu so predstavljeni rezultati v zvezi s Schrödingerjevimi matrikami grafov, ki jih potrebujemo pri definiciji invariante ▫$\mu$▫. Z ▫$\mu$▫ karakteriziramo tako ravninske kot ploščate grafe. V nadaljevanju predstavimo sorodno invarianto ▫$\lambda$▫, njeno zvezo z orientiranimi matroidi in podamo algoritem za računanje ▫$\lambda$▫ s pomočjo orientiranih matroidov.

BiblioEntry.Title: Algoritmi za izdelavo modela delovnega procesa : št. ref.: 22402/4
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Algoritmi za izdelavo modela delovnega procesa : št. ref.: 22402/4 / odgovorni vodja naloge Drago Bokal ; nalogo izdelali Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž, Simon Špacapan, Andrej Taranenko ; spremljevalec naloge Simon Pintar
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: št. ref.: 22402/4
BiblioEntry.Abstract: V delu obravnavamo problem izdelave delovnega procesa z metodami lokalne optimizacije. Podatke problema sestavljata skupina agentov, ki v delovnem procesu delujejo, in množica delovnih nalog, ki jih je potrebno v sklopu delovnega procesa opraviti. Delovne naloge so lahko opisane ali posamično ali pa kot družina istovrstnih delovnih nalog, ki jih je potrebno opravljati z zadostno frekvenco. Cilj je poiskati model delovnega procesa, ki opravi vse predpisane delovne naloge in čimbolj ustreza vnaprej predpisanim kriterijem. Vsako od delovnih nalog, ki morda še ni časovno determinirana, je potrebno umestiti v čas, poleg tega pa je potrebno zaporedja časovno združljivih delovnih nalog sestaviti v izmene sodelujočih agentov. Problem izdelave delovnega procesa formaliziramo in nakažemo možen pristop k reševanju problema z metodami lokalnega iskanja. Delo zaključimo z opisom XML dokumentov, ki lahko služijo kot komunikacija s programsko enoto za izdelavo delovnega procesa.

BiblioEntry.Title: Implementacija algoritma za razporejanje zaposlenih : navodila za uporabo : št. ref.: 22402/3
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Implementacija algoritma za razporejanje zaposlenih : navodila za uporabo : št. ref.: 22402/3 / odgovorni vodja naloge Drago Bokal ; nalogo izdelala Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž ; spremljevalec naloge Simon Pintar
BiblioEntry.Subtitle: navodila za uporabo
št. ref.: 22402/3
BiblioEntry.Abstract: Besedilo je razdeljeno na dva dela. V prvem je razvit model in predlagan algoritmičen pristop k problemu izdelave delovnega razporeda, v drugem pa so podana navodila za uporabo ActiveX komponente, v kateri je implementiran model iz prvega dela, ki obravnava problem razporejanja zaposlenih z metodami lokalne optimizacije. Podatki problema sestojijo iz množice zaposlenih in možice delovnih zahtev - izmen. Vsaki delovni zahtevi je treba zadostiti - zagotoviti zadostno število delavcev z ustreznimi znanji. Cilj je poiskati razpored delavcev v izmene, ki je za zaposlene in delodajalce čim ugodnejši. Problem razporejanja zaposlenih je formaliziran in nakazan je možen pristop k reševanju problema z metodami lokalne optimizacije. Le-te vključujejo lokalno vzpenjanje, iskanje brez vračanja in simulirano ohlajanje. Predlagane so hevristike, ki naj bi izboljšale učinkovitost optimizacijskega postopka, in metode, ki pomagajo pri razvoju samega algoritma. V drugem delu so podana navodila za uporabo ActiveX komponente, v kateri so implementirani koncepti iz prvega dela. Opisu programerskega vmesnika ActiveX komponente sledi opis XML jezika, s katerim komponenti posredujemo podatke, in skriptnega jezika, s katerim izberemo, kombiniramo in parametriziramo algoritme za izdelavo delovnega razporeda. Zadnje poglavje obsega navodila za razširjenje komponente.

BiblioEntry.Title: Rigidity and separation indices of graphs in surfaces
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Rigidity and separation indices of graphs in surfaces [Elektronski vir] / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Let ▫$\Sigma▫$ be a surface. We prove that rigidity indices of graphs which admit a polyhedral embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ and 5-connected graphs admitting an embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ are bounded by a constant depending on ▫$\Sigma$▫. Moreover if the Euler characteristic of ▫$\Sigma$▫ is negative, then the separation index of graphs admitting a polyhedral embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ is also bounded. As a side result we show that distinguishing number of both ▫$\Sigma$▫-polyhedral and 5-connected graphs which admit and embedding in ▫$\Sigma$▫ is also bounded.
BiblioEntry.Descriptors: matematika /teorija grafov /vložitev grafa /avtomorfizem grafa /delovanje grupe na grafu
mathematics /graph theory /graph embedding /graph automorphism /group action /genus of graph

BiblioEntry.Title: The minor crossing number
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The minor crossing number / Drago Bokal, Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Minorsko prekrižno število grafa ▫$G$▫ definiramo kot najmanjše prekrižno število med vsemi grafi, ki vsebujejo ▫$G$▫ kot minor. V članku so predstavljene osnovne lastnosti te nove grafovske invariante. Raziskana je topološka struktura grafov z omejenim minorskim prekrižnim številom. Določena je krepka različica spodnje meje, ki sledi iz roda grafa. Poleg tega je razširjena neenakost Morena in Salazarja med prekrižnim številom grafa in njegovih minorjev.

The minor crossing number of a graph ▫$G$▫ is defined as the minimum crossing number of all graphs that contain ▫$G$▫ as a minor. Basic properties of this new invariant are presented. Topological structure of graphs with bounded minor crossing number is determined and a new strong version of a lower bound based on the genus is derived. An inequality of Moreno and Salazar between crossing numbers of a graph and its minors is generalized.

BiblioEntry.Title: Rigidity and separation indices of Paley graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Rigidity and separation indices of Paley graphs / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Pokažemo, da je lahko razmerje med separacijskim in rigidnostnim številom grafa poljubno veliko. Tej lastnosti ustrezajo na primer Paleyjevi grafi.
It is shown that the ratio between separation and rigidity indices of graphs may be arbitrarily large. Paley graphs are such examples.

BiblioEntry.Title: The circular chromatic number of a digraph
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: The circular chromatic number of a digraph / D. Bokal ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Definirano je krožno kromatično število ▫$\chi_c$▫, pokazani so razni osnovni rezultati. Ti potrdijo, da je teorija barvanj digrafov podobna teoriji barvanj usmerjenih grafov, pri čemer neodvisne množice nadomestimo z acikličnimi. Ker imajo usmerjeni ▫$k$▫-cikli krožno kromatično število enako ▫$k/(k-1)$▫ za ▫$k \ge 2$▫, so mogoče vrednosti ▫$\chi_c$▫ tudi med 1 in 2. Pokažemo, da ▫$\chi_c$▫ lahko zavzame vse racionalne vrednosti, večje od 1. Poleg tega obstajajo digrafi s poljubno veliko dolžino najkrajšega usmerjenega cikla in hkrati s poljubno visokim krožnim kromatičnim številom. Problem odločanja, ali je za dani graf ▫$\chi_c \ge 2$▫ je NP-poln.

We introduce the circular chromatic number ▫$\chi_c$▫ of a digraph and establish various basic results. They show that the coloring theory for digraphs is similar to the coloring theory for undirected graphs when independend sets of vertices are replaced by acyclic sets. Since the directed ▫$k$▫-cycle has circular chromatic number ▫$k/(k-1)$▫, for ▫$k \ge 2$▫, values of ▫$\chi_c$▫ between 1 and 2 are possible. We show that in fact, ▫$\chi_c$▫ takes on all rational values greather then 1. Furthermore, there exist digraphs of arbitrarily large digirth and circular chromatic number. It is NP-complete to decide if a given digraph has ▫$\chi_c$▫ at most 2.

BiblioEntry.Title: Planar graphs without cycles of specific lengths
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Planar graphs without cycles of specific lengths / G. Fijavž ... [et al.]

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Ni se težko prepričati, da je vsak ravninski graf brez 3-ciklov 3-degeneriran. Znano je tudi, da je vsak ravninski graf brez 5-ciklov 3-degeneriran. V članku je dokazano, da so 3-degenerirani tudi ravninski grafi brez 6-ciklov.

It is easy to see that planar graphs without 3-cycles are 3-degenerate. Recently, it was proved that planar graphs without 5-cycles are also 3-degenerate. In this paper it is shown, more surprisingly, that the same holds for planar graphs without 6-cycles.

BiblioEntry.Title: Minor-minimal 5-connected projective-planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: Minor-minimal 5-connected projective-planar graphs / Gašper Fijavž

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Graf ▫$G$▫ je minimalen ▫$k$▫-povezan, če je ▫$k$▫-povezan, medtem ko noben pravi minor grafa ▫$G$▫ ni ▫$k$▫-povezan. V članku poiščemo vse minimalne 5-povezane projektivno-ravninske grafe, tj. določimo tako množico minimalnih 5-povezanih grafov ▫${\cal S}$▫, da vsak 5-povezani projektivno-ravninski graf vsebuje minor iz ▫${\cal S}$▫.

A graph ▫$G$▫ is minimal ▫$k$▫-connected, if it is ▫$k$▫-connected and every proper minor of ▫$G$▫ is not ▫$k$▫-connected. Minimal 5-connected projective-planar graphs are determined, i.e. a set ▫${\cal S}$▫ of minimal 5-connected graphs is presented, such that every 5-connected projective-planar graph contains a minor from ▫${\cal S}$▫.

BiblioEntry.Title: K [sub] 6 -minors in projective planar graphs
BiblioEntry.TitleISBD: K [sub] 6 -minors in projective planar graphs / Gašper Fijavž, Bojan Mohar

BiblioSet.Title: Preprint series
BiblioSet.Keytitle: Prepr. ser. - Univ. Ljubl. Inst. Math.

BiblioEntry.Abstract: Dokazano je, da vsak 5-povezan graf, ki je vložen v projektivno ravnino s celično širino vsaj 3, vsebuje polni graf ▫$K_6$▫ kot minor.
It is shown that every 5-connected graph embedded in the projective plane with face-width at least 3 contains the complete graph on 6 vertices as a minor.
